description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Microsoft 365 Dashboard / VBO v6 + Influx v2

options.content:
Veeam Backup for Microsoft 365
Installed version: $version

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_organization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "licensedUsers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamOrgName"] =~ /${organization:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["licensedUsers","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_organization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "newUsers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamOrgName"] =~ /${organization:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["newUsers","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_proxies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "threadsNumber")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxies"] =~ /${proxies:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["threadsNumber","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transferredData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamjobname"] =~ /${job:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["transferredData","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "processedObjects")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamjobname"] =~ /${job:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["processedObjects","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

panels.description: Veeam Backup for Microsoft 365 provides users with the ability to explore and restore data from backups by themselves or delegate this task to restore operators.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_restoreportal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "restorePortalEnabled")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Restore Portal Status
Self-Service Portal, and Restore Operators Security

panels.description: In the operator restore scenario, Veeam Backup for Microsoft 365 administrators must add restore operator roles. Inside the Roles, we have the Restore Operators, this is a list with all the Restore Operators, use the variable on the top to change between the different Roles.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_rbac_operators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rbacRoleAdminId")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["organization"] =~ /${organization:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["rbacRoleName"] =~ /${rbacrole:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["rbacRoleName","rbacROName","rbacRO365Name"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_rbac_scope")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rbacRoleScopeId")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["organization"] =~ /${organization:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["rbacRoleName"] =~ /${rbacrole:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["rbacRoleScopeName"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Restore Operators

panels.description: Restore operators will be able to explore and restore backed-up data of the objects listed on this table using Restore Portal.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_rbac_scope")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rbacRoleScopeId")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["organization"] =~ /${organization:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["rbacRoleName"] =~ /${rbacrole:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["rbacRoleScopeName","rbacRoleName","rbacRoleScope365Name"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transferredData")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalDuration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamjobname"] =~ /${job:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamjobname","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["veeamjobname"] =~ /${job:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["veeamjobname"])
  |> last()

panels.description:
This Panel includes the Backup Repositories.
When using Object Storage, it will appear on the right column with the prefix called OBJECT.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_repository")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "capacity" or r["_field"] == "freeSpace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["repository"] =~ /${repository:regex}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: (float(v: r.capacity) - float(v: r.freeSpace))  }))
  |> group(columns: ["repository","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["objectname","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Datastores - Usage Capacity

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["objectname","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["servicePoint"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["customRegionId"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["bucketname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_objectstorage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usedSpaceGB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["objectname"] =~ /${objectstorage:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["objectStorageEncryptionEnabled"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_repository")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "capacity" or r["_field"] == "freeSpace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["repository"] =~ /${repository:regex}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: (float(v: r.capacity) - float(v: r.freeSpace)) * (100.0 /float(v: r.capacity)) }))
  |> group(columns: ["repository","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_office365_version")
  |> keep(columns: ["veeamVersion"])
  |> distinct(column: "veeamVersion")
  |> group()
list.label: Veeam Office 365 Version
list.name: version

title: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Microsoft 365
